explains: adj. 多变的；有方格的；多波折的
v. 使交错；使交替变化（checker 的过去分词）

sentences.en: This trait is very important in correctly differentiating checkered beetles from Melyridae.
sentences.cn: 这一特征对正确区分格纹甲虫和金龟子科非常重要。

sentences.en: The network has had a similarly checkered history.
sentences.cn: 网络有着类似的曲折历史。

sentences.en: BMW also has a checkered past with alternative fuels.
sentences.cn: 宝马在可替代能源方面也有一段曲折的过去。
